itinerary.mapNote: High trail above gorge. Jade Dragon Snow Mountain views. 2670m.
Middle gorge section. Tiger Leaping Stone viewpoint. 1800m.

waypoints.name: Tiger Leaping Stone
waypoints.note: Narrowest gorge point 30m wide. Stone in river where tiger allegedly leapt.

waypoints.name: Jade Dragon Snow Mountain
waypoints.note: Dominant peak looming over gorge. Permanent snowfields. Sacred to Naxi.

waypoints.name: Haba Snow Mountain
waypoints.note: Opposite bank peak. Jade Dragon's 'bride' in local legend.

waypoints.name: 28 Bends Viewpoint
waypoints.note: Famous switchback section. Gorge depth 3900m below Jade Dragon peak.

waypoints.name: Walnut Grove
waypoints.note: Ancient walnut grove village. Oldest guesthouses on trail.
